title: Minced beef and potato bake
ingredients: ['450g lean beef mince', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '50g sliced mushrooms', '2 teaspoons yeast extract, such as Marmite® or Vegemite®', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '450g thinly sliced potatoes, peeled or unpeeled', '50g grated mature Cheddar cheese']
